summary.span: 表示 3-D 空間中的移動。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` -or ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *x**x* 這個 結構的 元件。The component of this structure. *y**y* 這個 結構的 元件。The component of this structure. *z**z* 這個 結構的 元件。The component of this structure. ## Examples 此範例示範如何減去結構使用多載的減法 (`-`) 運算子並靜態方法。This example shows how to subtract structures using the overloaded subtraction (`-`) operator and the static method. 下列程式碼示範如何使用減法方法。The following code shows how to use the subtraction methods. 首先，結構會具現化。First, the structures are instantiated. 結構中減去使用多載 (`-`) 運算子，然後使用者會使用靜態減去方法。The structures are subtracted using the overloaded (`-`) operator, and then they are subtracted using the static method. summary.span: 將 結構加上負號。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向量的大小和之前一樣，但是現在方向相反。The vector has the same magnitude as before, but its direction is now opposite. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何否定結構。The following example shows how to negate a structure. [!code-csharp[vector3dsample#Mil3dVectorSample3DN30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Vector3DSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mil3dvectorsample3dn30)] [!code-vb[vector3dsample#Mil3dVectorSample3DN30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Vector3DSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mil3dvectorsample3dn30)]

summary.span: 正規化指定的 結構。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準化會維護其方向，但它的範圍會成為`1`。A normalized maintains its direction but its magnitude becomes `1`. 產生通常稱為單位向量。The resulting is often called a unit vector. A正規化除以依據其重要性。A is normalized by dividing the by its magnitude. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將正規化結構。The following example shows how to normalize a structure. [!code-csharp[vector3dsample#Mil3dVectorSample3DN21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Vector3DSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mil3dvectorsample3dn21)] [!code-vb[vector3dsample#Mil3dVectorSample3DN21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Vector3DSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mil3dvectorsample3dn21)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個 結構的 、 和 屬性若相同，就表示兩個結構相等。Two structures are equal if the values of their , , and properties are the same. 使用說明值值。 values are described using values. 因為值可能會遺失精確度時，比較兩個操作時邏輯上相等的值可能會失敗。Because the value of a can lose precision when operated upon, a comparison between two values that are logically equal might fail. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用多載等號比較運算子來檢查是否有兩個結構是否相等。The following example shows how to use the overloaded equality operator to check if two structures are equal. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何計算兩個積結構。The following example shows how to calculate the dot product of two structures. 它也會示範如何將值指派給結構時所宣告的結構，以及之後已宣告的結構。It also shows how to assign values to a structure when the structure is being declared and after the structure has been declared.
